ovdesc.p: Defines different types of channels which T24 can be accessed.

desc.p: A short name that the channel is known by (e.g INTERNET)
Display proper errors or overrides instead of "Bucket" errors. Used internally for ARC Internet channel
The Type of a channel. Valid values are :-
Internal - Access internal to T24 (e.g. from T24 Browser)
Internet - Access via the internet (e.g. from external users with ARC-IB)
